      • computeTimeoutDeadline

        public static TimeoutDeadline computeTimeoutDeadline(@Nullable
                                                     ExecutionContext current,
                                                     TimeUnit unit,
                                                     long timeout)
                                              throws TimeoutException
        Compute the actual timeout taking in consideration the context deadline.
        Parameters:
        current - the context
        unit - timeout unit
        timeout - timeout value
        Returns:
        the earliest timeout (of the provided and context one)
        Throws:
        TimeoutException
